title: Save those teeth
brief_description: Emphasises the importance of proper cleansing and care of teeth and illustrates how teeth are affected by excessive use of refined sugar. Identifies the kind of bacteria that change sugar to acid in the mouth. Demonstrates the use of sodium fluoride solution in the prevention of tooth decay and prescribes specific rules to be followed in the care of teeth.
